Title: ALICE overview
Abstract: © 2016 The Authors.Recent results from the ALICE experiment are presented with a particular emphasis on particle identification, the nuclear modification factor (RAA) and azimuthal anisotropy (v2). Comparison of lead-lead and proton-lead results reveals evidence of collectivity in small systems.
